FuncDef:
The reset dfs authentication status command clears the authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets.
The reset fwm dfs authentication status command clears the authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets generated by the FWM module, including the packets for synchronizing MAC address entries. The reset dfs authentication status command clears the authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets. The reset fwm dfs authentication status command clears the authentication information and statistics about DFS group synchronization packets generated by the FWM module, including the packets for synchronizing MAC address entries.
CLIs: reset fwm dfs authentication status [ slot <slotid> ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 49 case-sensitive characters without spaces.
